Detailed Description

Collision detector that wraps the ODE physics library collision functionality

Definition at line 46 of file ODECollisionDetector.

virtual void physics::ODECollisionDetector::collide (  ref< const Collidable >  collidable  )  [inline, virtual]
 

convenience method that calls collide(collidable1, collidable2) for each pair of Collidables in the group collidable, unless collidable isn't a group or has child inter-collision disabled (so that you can keep all your Collidables in a single top-level group)

Reimplemented from physics::Collider.

virtual void base::Referenced::onUnreference (   )  const [inline, virtual, inherited]

bool base::Referenced::unreference (   )  const [inline, inherited]
 

Decrement the reference count by one, indicating that a pointer to this object is referencing it. If the refence count goes to zero, it is assumed that this object is nolonger referenced and is automatically deleted.
